001package edu.cnm.deepdive.gravity.controller;
002
003import android.graphics.Color;
004import android.graphics.drawable.Drawable;
005import android.media.MediaPlayer;
006import android.os.Bundle;
007import android.util.Log;
008import android.view.MotionEvent;
009import android.view.View;
010import android.widget.AdapterView;
011import android.widget.AdapterView.OnItemSelectedListener;
012import android.widget.ArrayAdapter;
013import android.widget.Button;
014import android.widget.ImageView;
015import android.widget.TextView;
016import androidx.annotation.NonNull;
017import androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity;
018import androidx.core.content.res.ResourcesCompat;
019import androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner;
020import androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelProvider;
021import com.google.android.material.slider.Slider;
022import com.google.android.material.slider.Slider.OnChangeListener;
023import dagger.hilt.android.AndroidEntryPoint;
024import edu.cnm.deepdive.gravity.R;
025import edu.cnm.deepdive.gravity.databinding.ActivityGameBinding;
026import edu.cnm.deepdive.gravity.model.GameField;
027import edu.cnm.deepdive.gravity.model.entity.Score;
028import edu.cnm.deepdive.gravity.model.entity.User;
029import edu.cnm.deepdive.gravity.viewmodel.GameFieldViewModel;
030import edu.cnm.deepdive.gravity.viewmodel.ScoreViewModel;
031import edu.cnm.deepdive.gravity.viewmodel.UserViewModel;
032import java.time.Instant;
033import org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull;
034
035/**
036 * Represents the GameActivity within the application, where the gameplay occurs.
037 * This activity extends AppCompatActivity, providing compatibility with older versions
038 * of Android.
039 * It sets up the initial state of the game.
040 * Upon creation, this activity initializes the game environment, such as setting up
041 * the layout, initializing MediaPlayer for sound effects, and configuring game-specific
042 * functionalities.
043 */
044@AndroidEntryPoint
045public class GameActivity extends AppCompatActivity {
046
047  GameField gameField;
048  ImageView imageViewPhoto;
049  MediaPlayer mediaPlayer;
050  MediaPlayer mediaPlayer2;
051  MediaPlayer mediaPlayer3;
052  int background = 1;
053  ImageView imageViewShip;
054  TextView levelView;
055  TextView counterView;
056  Button moveUp;
057  int Measuredwidth = 0;
058  int Measuredheight = 0;
059  Boolean inProgress;
060  int score;
061  int counter = 1;
062  GameFieldViewModel gameFieldViewModel;
063  private ActivityGameBinding binding;
064  private UserViewModel userViewModel;
065  private ScoreViewModel scoreViewModel;
066  private User currentUser;
067
068
069  @Override
070  public boolean onTouchEvent(MotionEvent event) {
071    imageViewPhoto = findViewById(R.id.profile_photo);
072    return super.onTouchEvent(event);
073  }
074
075
076  @Override
077  protected void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState) {
078    super.onCreate(savedInstanceState);
079    binding = ActivityGameBinding.inflate(getLayoutInflater());
080    setContentView(binding.getRoot());
081    mediaPlayer3 = MediaPlayer.create(this, R.raw.explosion2);
082    setup();
083    gameButtons();
084  }
085
086  @Override
087  protected void onDestroy() {
088    super.onDestroy();
089    if (mediaPlayer != null) {
090      mediaPlayer.release();
091      mediaPlayer = null;
092    }
093    if (mediaPlayer2 != null) {
094      mediaPlayer2.release();
095      mediaPlayer2 = null;
096    }
097    if (mediaPlayer3 != null) {
098      mediaPlayer3.release();
099      mediaPlayer3 = null;
100    }
101
102  }
103
104  private void gameButtons() {
105    binding.play.setOnClickListener((view) -> {
106      gameFieldViewModel.run();
107      binding.pause.setVisibility(View.VISIBLE);
108      binding.pause.setEnabled(true);
109      binding.moveUp.setEnabled(true);
110      binding.moveDown.setEnabled(true);
111      binding.shoot.setEnabled(true);
112      binding.play.setVisibility(View.INVISIBLE);
113      mediaPlayer2 = MediaPlayer.create(this, R.raw.intro);
114      mediaPlayer2.start();
115    });
116    binding.pause.setOnClickListener((view) -> {
117      binding.play.setVisibility(View.VISIBLE);
118      binding.moveUp.setEnabled(false);
119      binding.moveDown.setEnabled(false);
120      binding.shoot.setEnabled(false);
121      binding.pause.setVisibility(View.INVISIBLE);
122      gameFieldViewModel.paused();
123    });
124    binding.moveUp.setOnClickListener((view) -> {
125      gameFieldViewModel.shipMoveUp();
126    });
127    binding.moveDown.setOnClickListener((view) -> gameFieldViewModel.shipMoveDown());
128    binding.shoot.setOnClickListener((view) -> {
129      gameFieldViewModel.shoot();
130      mediaPlayer = MediaPlayer.create(this, R.raw.shoot);
131      mediaPlayer.start();
132    });
133    binding.velocity.addOnChangeListener(new OnChangeListener() {
134      @Override
135      public void onValueChange(@NonNull @NotNull Slider slider, float value, boolean fromUser) {
136        gameFieldViewModel.setVelocity(value);
137        //System.out.println(value);
138      }
139    });
140    binding.angle.addOnChangeListener(new OnChangeListener() {
141      @Override
142      public void onValueChange(@NonNull @NotNull Slider slider, float value, boolean fromUser) {
143        gameFieldViewModel.setAngle((int) value);
144        //System.out.println(value);
145      }
146    });
147
148    binding.gravity.setBackgroundColor(Color.parseColor("#FFFFFF"));
149    binding.gravity.setAdapter(new ArrayAdapter<>(this, R.layout.spinner_item,
150        getResources().getStringArray(R.array.gravity_array)));
151    binding.gravity.setOnItemSelectedListener(new OnItemSelectedListener() {
152      @Override
153      public void onItemSelected(AdapterView<?> parent, View view, int position, long id) {
154        String value = binding.gravity.getSelectedItem().toString();
155        //System.out.println(value);
156        switch (value) {
157          case "Moon":
158            gameFieldViewModel.setGravity(1.6);
159            break;
160          case "Mercury", "Mars":
161            gameFieldViewModel.setGravity(3.7);
162            break;
163          case "Uranus":
164            gameFieldViewModel.setGravity(8.7);
165            break;
166          case "Venus":
167            gameFieldViewModel.setGravity(8.9);
168            break;
169          case "Saturn":
170            gameFieldViewModel.setGravity(9);
171            break;
172          case "Earth":
173            gameFieldViewModel.setGravity(9.8);
174            break;
175          case "Neptune":
176            gameFieldViewModel.setGravity(11);
177            break;
178          case "Jupiter":
179            gameFieldViewModel.setGravity(23.1);
180            break;
181          case "Sun":
182            gameFieldViewModel.setGravity(274);
183            break;
184        }
185
186      }
187
188      @Override
189      public void onNothingSelected(AdapterView<?> parent) {
190        gameFieldViewModel.setGravity(9.8);
191      }
192    });
193  }
194
195  private void setup() {
196    binding.pause.setVisibility(View.INVISIBLE);
197    binding.moveUp.setEnabled(false);
198    binding.moveDown.setEnabled(false);
199    binding.shoot.setEnabled(false);
200    ViewModelProvider viewModelProvider = new ViewModelProvider(this);
201    gameFieldViewModel = viewModelProvider.get(GameFieldViewModel.class);
202    //Log.i("GameActivity", "Initialized");
203    gameFieldViewModel
204        .getGameField()
205        .observe(this, (field) -> {
206          if (gameField != field) {
207            binding.gameView.setGameField(field);
208            gameField = field;
209          }
210          int level = gameField.getLevel();
211          binding.gameView.invalidate();
212          binding.level.setText(String.valueOf(level));
213          binding.counter.setText(String.valueOf(gameField.getCounter()));
214          score = gameField.getCounter() * 50;
215          if (this.counter == gameField.getCounter()) {
216            mediaPlayer = MediaPlayer.create(this, R.raw.explosion2);
217            mediaPlayer.start();
218            this.counter++;
219          }
220          binding.scoreValueText.setText(String.valueOf(score));
221          Drawable b = switch ((level - 1) % 3 + 1) {
222            case 1 ->
223                ResourcesCompat.getDrawable(getResources(), R.drawable.play_background1, null);
224            case 2 -> ResourcesCompat.getDrawable(getResources(), R.drawable.img_1, null);
225            case 3 -> ResourcesCompat.getDrawable(getResources(), R.drawable.img, null);
226            default -> null;
227          };
228          if (b != null) {
229            binding.gameConstraint.setBackground(b);
230          }
231
232        });
233    gameFieldViewModel.getInProgress()
234        .observe(this, (inProgress) -> {
235          Log.d(getClass().getSimpleName(), "inProgress=" + inProgress);
236          if (Boolean.TRUE.equals(this.inProgress) && Boolean.FALSE.equals(inProgress)) {
237            Drawable b = ResourcesCompat.getDrawable(getResources(), R.drawable.play_background1,
238                null);
239            binding.gameConstraint.setBackground(b);
240            mediaPlayer3.start();
241            addScores();
242            finish();
243          }
244          this.inProgress = inProgress;
245        });
246    setupUserViewModel(viewModelProvider, this);
247    setupScoreViewModel(viewModelProvider, this);
248  }
249
250
251  private void setupUserViewModel(ViewModelProvider provider, LifecycleOwner owner) {
252    userViewModel = provider
253        .get(UserViewModel.class);
254    userViewModel
255        .getCurrentUser()
256        .observe(owner, (user) -> this.currentUser = user);
257  }
258
259  private void setupScoreViewModel(ViewModelProvider provider, LifecycleOwner owner) {
260    scoreViewModel = provider
261        .get(ScoreViewModel.class);
262    // TODO: 10/26/23 Observe scoreId or Score from view model.
263  }
264
265  private void addScores() {
266    Score score = new Score();
267    score.setStarted(Instant.now());
268    score.setValue(this.score);
269    score.setPlayer_id(currentUser.getId());
270    scoreViewModel.save(score, currentUser);
271  }
272
273
274}
